title: John Burnet of Barns: A Romance
author: Buchan, John
snippet: When I rode through the village of Broughton and came to the turn of thehill at Dreva, the sun was already westering.

title: John Burnet of Barns: A Romance
author: Buchan, John
snippet: I struck straight for the ridge of Dreva, androunding it, faced the long valley of Tweed, with Rachan woods andDrummelzier haughs and the level lands of Stobo.
